report_text: On 2024-05-10 at 10:30 AM near NH44, two cars collided; driver A sustained minor injuries; no fatalities.
summary: Two-car collision on NH44 on 2024-05-10; minor injuries, no fatalities.

report_text: On 2024-06-01 a truck lost control at the flyover causing major pileup; multiple vehicles damaged; two fatalities.
summary: Truck lost control on flyover on 2024-06-01 causing pileup; multiple damages and two fatalities.

report_text: Motorcycle hit a pothole and skidded into a roadside pole; rider injured and taken to hospital.
summary: Motorcycle skidded on pothole into pole; rider injured and hospitalized.
